title: LEARN-SQL: Automatic assessment of SQL based on IMS QTI specification
authors: C Quer - Eighth IEEE International Conference on Advanced  …
excerpt: ABSTRACT In this paper we present LEARN-SQL, a system conforming to the IMS QTI specification that allows on-line learning and assessment of students on SQL skills in an automatic, interactive, informative, scalable and extensible manner.
